cons: If you have thyroid problems, you may consult your health professional.
name: Maca
pros: Maca is a medicinal plant that mainly grows in the mountains of Peru.
The edible part of the plant is the root, which grows underground.
It exists in several colors, ranging from white to black.
High in protein and carbs and rich in a number of nutrients, including vitamin C, copper, and iron.
Increase sperm production and improve sperm quality, enhancing fertility in men.
Maca may improve your mental well-being and mood by reducing depression and anxiety, especially in menopausal women.
